snippet: To the Editor:    A.M. Rosenthal, writing about the passage in California of Proposition 215 to legalize marijuana for medical use (column, Nov. 8), says that ''money from tax-free foundations, particularly those of George Soros, pushed the mariju...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: A.M. Rosenthal, writing about the passage in California of Proposition 215 to legalize marijuana for medical use (column, Nov. 8), says that ''money from tax-free foundations, particularly those of George Soros, pushed the marijuana proposition to success.'' This is false.
abstract: George Soros letter disputes A M Rosenthal's November 8 Op-Ed column on passage of California's Proposition 215 to legalize marijuana for medical use (S)
